staff.comm: The staff are friendly and helpful, contributing positively to the overall experience.

itemA: The staff were courteous and helpful.
I stayed over the weekend and was VERY impressed with the quality of service (friendly staff) and the great room (really clean).
itemB: The rest of the property was outstanding.

room_quality.comm: The rooms are modern, clean, and well-equipped, suitable for short stays.

itemA: The room was modern and suited our needs for a one night rental.
The queen room was small but nice and recently updated.
itemB: The room was very modern with sophisticated looking furnishings, a very comfortable bed, and nice walk-in shower.
My spouse and I stayed in a superior studio suite and were extremely satisfied with our stay.

location.comm: The hotel is conveniently located in downtown, close to popular attractions and shopping.

itemA: Location is perfect, just on Yonge and Wellington (close to Eaton Centre for shopping and CN Tower Skydome for sightseeing).
Things like CN Tower, Rogers Centre/Skydome, the Eaton Centre, harbourfront, and Dundas Square are all between 5 and 20 minutes' walk.
itemB: Hotel is in a fab location to walk to the main shopping mall and the heart of Downtown.
Walking distance to Eaton Centre, restaurants and theatres.

cleanliness.comm: The hotel is described as very clean, contributing to a pleasant stay.

itemA: The hotel itself is clean and comfortable.
itemB: Hotel is very clean and the staff were lovely, very helpful, and pleasant.

itemA.value: We got a decent deal online by having to show our concert ticket.
itemA.amenities: We paid a little extra for the "Business Room" which came with a bottle of water and Apple TV.

itemB.dining: The breakfast down in the adjoining restaurant, Over Easy, was great in the morning.
itemB.ambiance: My only disappointment was that there was no wi-fi (only hard-wired) so I was unable to use it.
